Mayor Pro Tem Tim Stinneford
----------------------------

#### Term expires: May 2028

**Phone:**
817-685-1411, ext. 1 |
**Email:**
[place1@eulesstx.gov](https://forms.eulesstx.gov/Forms/CouncilContact?Contact=place1@eulesstx.gov)

![Place 1 Tim Stinneford](https://www.eulesstx.gov/home/showpublishedimage/6946/638427377330130000)
Tim Stinneford is a retired Senior Property Manager with Trinity Interests, and he stays active by assisting them with special projects. Prior to being elected to the City Council, he served on the Zoning Board of Adjustment and currently serves on the Euless Development Corporation.

He is a member of the Citizen's Police Academy Alumni Association, Citizens On Patrol, Citizen's Fire Academy Alumni Association, the Child Abduction Response Team and an inaugural member of the Citizen's Emergency Response Team.

In 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009 and 2012 he received the Presidential Bronze Volunteer Service Award for volunteering at least 100 hours.

Tim and his wife, Faye, have been married for over 30 years, and have a daughter, Julie, and a grandson, Dylan.

The City of Euless, TX
